GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v5.15.79
GSD.description:
net: wwan: iosm: fix memory leak in ipc_pcie_read_bios_cfg

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.79 by commit 13b1ea861e8aeb701bcfbfe436b943efa2d44029, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 7e98d785ae6184c7580a33619dae8b651769ff08. For more details please see the references link.
